title: CAROLL FORREST CONNER
maintext: CAROLL FORREST CONNER, 83, of Ceredo, widow of Buel Eugene Conner, died Feb. 6 at her daughterâ€™s home in Flatwoods, Ky. Funeral services will be 2 p.m. Saturday, Ceredo-Kenova Funeral Home, with visitation one hour prior. Burial will follow at Crescent Hill Cemetery, Ceredo. www.ceredo-kenovafuneralhome.com.
